title: An epitaphe vpon the worthy and honorable lady, the Lady Knowles
author: Newton, Thomas, 1542?-1607.
publisher: In Fleetstreete, by William How, for Richarde Iohnes: and are to be solde at his shop vnder the Lotterie house,
notes: Verse - "Death with his darte hath vs berefte,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
